name: Fuck I'm in Space
description:
You've crash-landed on an alien island and need to get back home! Luckily there are five fuel rods dispersed throughout the terrain that you can collect to refuel your spaceship and get the fuck out of here! Watch out for the UFOs - they're passive but can kill you if you collide into them. Good luck!

Use the [A,W,S,D] keys to move forward, backwards and side-to-side.

Use the mouse or touchpad to aim and change directions.

Click the mouse to shoot bullets.

Use [Space] key to jump
